channel.title: Mediagazer
channel.description: Top news and commentary for media professionals from all around the web

item.title: メキシコ人ジャーナリスト、エミリオ・グティérrez・ソトは、メキシコへの強制送還をめぐる15年にわたる法廷闘争の末、米国での亡命権を獲得した（Uriel J. García/The Texas Tribune）。
item.description:
Uriel J. García / The Texas Tribune:
Mexican journalist Emilio Gutiérrez Soto wins the right to asylum in the United States after a 15-year legal battle against deportation to Mexico  —  Emilio Gutiérrez Soto fled with his son to the U.S. border in 2008 after his reporting on the Mexican military led to threats.

item.title: ヘッジファンド創設者ケン・グリフィンが、自身の税務申告に関する記事に関連する文書を求めてプロパブリカと5人のジャーナリストを召喚、プロパブリカは情報源の保護を誓う（David Voreacos/Bloomberg）
item.description:
David Voreacos / Bloomberg:
Hedge fund founder Ken Griffin subpoenas ProPublica and five journalists for documents tied to stories on his tax returns; ProPublica vows to protect sources  —  - ProPublica vows to protect sources amid ‘sprawling’ requests  — Griffin suing IRS over failure to protect his secret tax data

item.title: 反発を受けたドリュー・バリモアが、9月18日に復帰する自身の番組について脚本家と労働組合に謝罪し、ストライキの規則について「順守する」と述べた（Elizabeth Wagmeister/Variety）
item.description:
Elizabeth Wagmeister / Variety:
After a backlash, Drew Barrymore apologizes to writers and unions for her show returning on September 18, saying “we will be in compliance” with strike rules  —  Drew Barrymore is offering up an explanation as to why her daytime talk show is returning, amid fierce criticism during the writers strike.

item.title: Plex、ホスティング会社Hetznerを利用しているユーザーに対し、大規模なTOS違反を理由に10月にアクセスをブロックする予定であることを通知（Ernesto Van der Sar/TorrentFreak）
item.description:
Ernesto Van der Sar / TorrentFreak:
Plex notifies users that the streaming company plans to block access in October for those who use the hosting company Hetzner, citing large-scale TOS violations  —  Plex is a multifunctional media software and service that allows users to easily access all their entertainment in one place.

item.title: WBDのドイツ、スイス、オーストリア担当ゼネラルマネジャーであるハンネス・ヘイエルマン氏が、EMEA担当のプリヤ・ドグラ氏、UK担当のアントニオ・ルイス氏に続いて退任（Max Goldbart/Deadline）
item.description:
Max Goldbart / Deadline:
WBD's General Manager for Germany, Switzerland, and Austria, Hannes Heyelmann, steps down, following the exits of EMEA head Priya Dogra and UK head Antonio Ruiz  —  Warner Bros. Discovery Germany boss Hannes Heyelmann has become the latest to exit from Gerhard Zeiler's international team.

item.title: ローリング・ストーン』誌の共同創設者ジャン・ウェナーが、友人へのインタビュー、団塊世代の遺産、そして7人の白人男性ロック・ミュージシャンを描いた新著『The Masters』について語ったQ&A（David Marchese/New York Times）。
item.description:
David Marchese / New York Times:
Q&A with Rolling Stone co-founder Jann Wenner on interviewing his friends, boomers' legacy, and his new book, The Masters, about seven white male rock musicians  —  “We've lived really privileged lives,” says the co-founder of Rolling Stone.  “Now we get to rest.”

item.title: 情報源VFX会社DNEG、スタッフに7カ月間20％以上の減給か36カ月間のローン制度に同意するよう指示、DNEGは7月にロンドン本社の従業員の7.5％を削減（Max Goldbart/Deadline）
item.description:
Max Goldbart / Deadline:
Sources: VFX firm DNEG told staff to take 20%+ pay cuts for seven months or agree to a 36-month loan scheme; DNEG cut ~7.5% of its London HQ workforce in July  —  EXCLUSIVE: Just weeks after laying off dozens in its London HQ, Dune VFX firm DNEG is asking staff to take up to 25% pay cuts …

item.title: X、クラウドソーシングによるファクトチェック機能「Community Notes」を変更、投稿者に他のノート案を表示し、評価を提出する前に他の視点を確認できるように（Sarah Perez/TechCrunch）
item.description:
Sarah Perez / TechCrunch:
X changes its crowdsourced fact-checking Community Notes feature to show contributors other note proposals and see other viewpoints before they submit a rating  —  X (formerly Twitter) this week changed how its crowdsourced fact-checking Community Notes feature works.

item.title: 情報筋ニューヨーク・タイムズ紙は、ポリティコ・プレイブックの共同執筆者ライアン・リザと、同紙のニュースレター「オン・ポリティクス」の再開を支援することについて真剣な話し合いを持った（Benjy Sarlin/Semafor）
item.description:
Benjy Sarlin / Semafor:
Sources: The New York Times has had serious talks with Politico Playbook co-author Ryan Lizza about helping the newspaper relaunch its On Politics newsletter  —  Punchbowl News: As negotiations within the House GOP conference continue over a stopgap funding bill, some GOP members are hopeful …

item.title: 情報筋Fox Newsは9月8日、女性からセクハラとストーカー行為を受けたとしてベテラン幹部のジョン・フィンリーを解雇。
item.description:
Mediaite:
Sources: Fox News fired veteran executive John Finley on September 8 following a woman alleging he sexually harassed and stalked her; Fox settled with the woman  —  John Finley, a top Fox News executive who was fired last week after more than 20 years at the network, was ousted after a woman alleged …

item.title: 情報筋MetaはWhatsAppに広告を表示し、広告なしでアプリを利用するためにサブスクリプション料金を課すかどうかを検討中。
item.description:
Financial Times:
Sources: Meta is exploring whether to show ads in WhatsApp and charge a subscription fee to use the app without ads; WhatsApp denies working on such a feature  —  Talks are at an early stage, sources say, as Facebook parent looks for new ways to increase revenue

item.title: MailOnlineがBBCのギャビー・ローガンとその夫に虚偽の請求に対する「多額の損害賠償」を支払うことに合意、元サン編集長のケルヴィン・マッケンジーはツイートに対する支払いに合意（Haroon Siddique/The Guardian）
item.description:
Haroon Siddique / The Guardian:
MailOnline agrees to pay the BBC's Gabby Logan and her husband “substantial damages” over false claims; ex-Sun editor Kelvin MacKenzie agrees to pay for a tweet  —  Payout relates to article that wrongly claimed pair had received £500,000 to promote tax avoidance schemes

item.title: アドテク・プラットフォームInfillionの会長兼創業者であるロブ・エムリッヒに、Infillionが破産から買収したアドテク企業MediaMathの計画についてQ&A（Alyssa Boyle/AdExchanger）
item.description:
Alyssa Boyle / AdExchanger:
Q&A with Rob Emrich, the chair and founder of ad tech platform Infillion, on his plans for ad tech company MediaMath, which Infillion acquired out of bankruptcy  —  Infillion is finally unveiling its intentions for MediaMath after buying the company out of bankruptcy during an auction last month.

item.title: ABCニュースの社員を含む情報筋によると、ニュースルームは恐怖と戦々恐々とした雰囲気に包まれていた。
item.description:
Oliver Darcy / CNN:
Sources including ABC News employees describe a feeling of dread and trepidation in the newsroom; staff say they read about the potential sale in the press  —  Editor's Note: A version of this article first appeared in the “Reliable Sources” newsletter.  Sign up for the daily digest chronicling the evolving media landscape here.

item.title: ABCの不安 - ABCニュースに警鐘が鳴らされている。- ディズニーが所有するニュースルーム...(CNN)
item.description:
CNN:
